name: The Mystery Hotel
description:
What will you do when you wake up and find yourself in a mysterious room?

Try to find information and passwords in the room and RUN AWAY!

INSTRUCTIONS:

Use the arrow keys to move and the mouse to change the viewing angle.

Use  "C" to crouch, "R" to reset the game, and "Q" to quit.

Press "E" to interact with items(Only items with a prompt in the lower-left corner can interact.)

Please DOWNLOAD to enjoy the MUSIC, something wrong with my web build in unity. My Web builds no sounds at all but other platforms work very well. I will try to fix it ASAP. 

Hope you enjoy my game!

Credit: Music Composed by Amy Chau

------------------------------------ANSWERS  WARNING----------------------------------

Hints for Puzzle 1: Try to think of the letter of each number.

Hints for Puzzle 2: Try to find out the number of capitalized items.
